overview: A short film that explores the lives of seven young New Yorkers during a twenty-four hour period of near misses, tattered relationships and crumbling dreams. A Bohemian dog walker, an unemployed single mom, a Swedish fashion photographer, an aspiring dancer from Georgia, a gay South African model and two British grad students inadvertently discover that sometimes to find yourself, you have to acknowledge being lost.
tagline: Sometimes to find yourself, you have to admit you're lost.
title: It Is What It Is
